definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: fellow (-woman);—sf. in recipr. phr. [[אִשָּׁה מֵתֵ רְעוּתָהּ]] Ex 11:2 (E) each from her fellow (‖[[אִישׁ מֵאֵת רֵעֵהוּ ]], cf. II. [[רֵעַ]]
); cf. Je 9:19; of birds of prey ([[דַיּוֹת]]) Is 34:15 cf. v:Is 34:16; people under fig. of sheep Zec 11:9; [[רְעוּתָהּ]] Es 1:19 = another than she (cf. 1Sa 15:28 II. [[רֵעַ]]
